title: DTL service disruption due to signalling fault

updates.text: Pls be informed that trains on the DTL will continue to travel at lower speeds bet. Promenade & Downtown Stns until the end of svc hours today. Pls add additional 15 mins when travelling on this sector. Recovery works on the signalling fault are ongoing.
DTL SVC btw Expo & Bukit Panjang is delayed due to a signalling fault. Additional travel time of 15 minutes may be expected. We are sorry.
